headline: Beverages, Alcohol, and Tobacco Stocks Q4 In Review: Altria (NYSE:MO) Vs Peers
summary: The end of the earnings season is always a good time to take a step back and see who shined (and who not so much). Let’s take a look at how beverages, alcohol, and tobacco stocks fared in Q4, starting with Altria (NYSE:MO).
